title: SAM2 checkpoint loading (portable, explicit backend checks)
scope: Add SAM2 checkpoint/config loading without machine-specific absolute paths.
Fail explicitly and actionably when checkpoint or runtime deps are missing.
Record SAM2 version/config details in diagnostics when enabled.
acceptance: SAM2 can be enabled via config with a portable checkpoint path/reference.
Missing checkpoint produces an actionable error (not silent disable).
Diagnostics record SAM2 model type, checkpoint ref, and device.

deliverables.title: SAM2 integration wrapper and config
acceptance: Loader validates checkpoint refs and initializes SAM2 predictably.

subtasks.title: Implement SAM2 loader with explicit checks and diagnostics.
done_when: sam2/loader.py exists with explicit error handling.
